artist: Natori Shunsen; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head of woman wearing headdress, looking up; multicolored floral kimono; purple ground; label glued on back
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
text: Thirty-first design of a set of 36. Based on Nakamura Fukusuke V as Ohan in the scene Obiya mise saki of the play Katsuragawa renri no shigarami 桂川連理柵　帯屋見世先 (Union by the Weir in the River Katsura), performed at the Azabu Meiji Theater, February 1924.
title: The Actor Nakamura Fukusuke V as Ohan
